scripts.build: cd spa/ && npm run build-to-wp && cd .. && mkdir -p dist/$npm_package_version && cp -r src dist/$npm_package_version && echo $npm_package_version &> dist/$npm_package_version/truedit/VERSION.txt && cd dist/$npm_package_version/truedit && sed -i -e "s/1.0.0/$npm_package_version/" truedit.php && zip -r truedit_wppi.zip ./* && mv truedit_wppi.zip ..
